author: wtopstaff
title: Blues-Canucks Sums
text:
1 2—3 
First Period_1, St. Louis, Lehtera 2 (Schwartz, Gunnarsson), 7:36. Penalties_Burrows, Van (high-sticking), 10:30; Ott, StL (slashing), 15:43. 
Second Period_2, St. Louis, Steen 3 (Tarasenko, Stastny), 4:52. 3, St. Louis, Bortuzzo 1 (Tarasenko, Steen), 10:01. 4, Vancouver, Sutter 2 (Sbisa), 12:38 (sh). Penalties_Sbisa, Van (unsportsmanlike conduct), 6:11; Brouwer, StL (interference), 7:45; Bortuzzo, StL, major (fighting), 11:12; Dorsett, Van, major (fighting), 11:12; D.Sedin, Van (holding), 12:28; Tarasenko, StL, double minor (high-sticking), 18:27. 
Third Period_5, St. Louis, Brodziak 1 (Brouwer, Gunnarsson), 16:14. 6, Vancouver, McCann 2 (Burrows, Sutter), 16:44. 7, Vancouver, D.Sedin 2 (Hutton, Sutter), 19:31. Penalties_Steen, StL (hooking), 7:14; Bartkowski, Van (tripping), 11:21. 
Shots on Goal_St. Louis 13-8-11_32. Vancouver 9-9-16_34. 
Power-play opportunities_St. Louis 0 of 4; Vancouver 0 of 5. 
Goalies_St. Louis, Allen 1-1-0 (34 shots-31 saves). Vancouver, Miller 3-1-1 (32-28). 
A_18,362 (18,910). T_2:24. 
Referees_Chris Lee, Graham Skilliter. Linesmen_John Grandt, Vaughan Rody. Topics:
